Yeah, sure. We can foget about Greven and Skullgrin.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., "LurkerAbyss" <1641coburn@h...> wrote:
> OOC: *gives self a BIG slap on the side of the head* DAMN I HATE IT
WHEN I FORGET THINGS OR DO STUPID THINGS!!  Sorry.  I don't know what
I was thinking, see, I've been very pissed off at my internet today,
and I haven't been able to think right because I had been having some
mouse(comp, not real) troubles and the computer is nothing without the
mouse, and see, I have a physical and mental dependency on the
computer.  Don't get much excercise 'cause I'm so into my comp. 
Hehe!  Well, anyway, can we just say that Skullgrin didn't go into
Pretender mode?  So Yan, can we scratch Skullgrin attacking Greven,
before anything major happens?  Thanks.  Also, can somebody tell me
where there are some good deals on duck tape or clothes-pins?  I can't
seem to shutup when it comes to the....Ok, I'll shutup!
> 
> IC: Skullgrin grinned evilly at his master's words.  Skullgrin was
ready to weild Megatron in gun mode.  He grabbed out to get the gun.
